scikits.statsmodels.family.links.CDFLink¶

class scikits.statsmodels.family.links.CDFLink(dbn=<scipy.stats.distributions.norm_gen object at 0x019CFD50>)¶

The use the CDF of a scipy.stats distribution

CDFLink is a subclass of logit in order to use its _clean method for the link and its derivative.

Parameters:

dbn : scipy.stats distribution

Default is dbn=scipy.stats.norm

Notes

The CDF link is untested.

Methods

inverse(z) The inverse of the CDF link

Previous topic

scikits.statsmodels.family.links.Link.deriv

Next topic

scikits.statsmodels.family.links.CDFLink.inverse
